name: Draw a sword and race
description:
the game idea and design was  provided by a publisher .

Draw your sword , Fight enemies in your way and win the race .

Draw your Sword to use it when an enemy stops you from running. Pick your sword and fight it .You don’t only have to fight enemies in your way , you also need to finish the race before your opponent . if your opponent wins , you die instantly .

Tips for winning :

If the enemy is defending low , you need to attack high.

If your enemy is defending high , you need to attack low.

Always attack the unprotected zone if you want to win .
